name: Cubuilder VR for Google Cardboard
description:
Use colorful blocks to construct worlds straight out of your imagination. Cubuilder not only lets you build custom scenes, but also allows you to experience your creations directly in 360 VR. (Google Cardboard)

FEATURES:
- Unlimited custom scenes
- Highly customizable levels
- Easy-to-learn controls
- Stackable cubes that can be used to create large or complex structures
- 8 unique & colorful building blocks to choose from
- Player can teleport throughout the scene
- Detailed tutorial w/ animated illustrations
- Savable scenes that can viewed/edited later on
- Spacious build area

- No ads
- No in-game purchases
- No registration
- No posting to social media
- No push notifications
